event.description: Jimmy Rollins strikes out swinging.
Shane Victorino pops out to second baseman Alex Cora.
Chase Utley walks.
Ryan Howard strikes out swinging.
Jayson Werth strikes out swinging.
Raul Ibanez called out on strikes.
Pedro Feliz strikes out swinging.
Carlos Ruiz grounds out, third baseman David Wright to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Chan Ho Park walks.
Jimmy Rollins singles on a line drive to center fielder Carlos Beltran. Chan Ho Park to 2nd.
Shane Victorino grounds out softly to first baseman Carlos Delgado. Chan Ho Park to 3rd. Jimmy Rollins to 2nd.
Chase Utley grounds out, second baseman Alex Cora to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Ryan Howard strikes out swinging.
Jayson Werth strikes out swinging.
Raul Ibanez strikes out swinging. Passed ball by catcher Omir Santos. Raul Ibanez to 1st.
Pedro Feliz grounds out, pitcher Johan Santana to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Carlos Ruiz flies out to center fielder Carlos Beltran.
Chan Ho Park walks.
Jimmy Rollins pops out to first baseman Carlos Delgado in foul territory.
Shane Victorino flies out to center fielder Carlos Beltran.
Chase Utley flies out to left fielder Daniel Murphy.
Ryan Howard grounds out to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Jayson Werth strikes out swinging.
Raul Ibanez hits a ground-rule double (8) on a line drive to right-center field.
Pedro Feliz pops out to catcher Omir Santos.
Carlos Ruiz grounds out, shortstop Jose Reyes to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Eric Bruntlett replaces Chan Ho Park.
Eric Bruntlett strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Ramon Castro replaces Fernando Tatis, batting 7th, playing catcher.
Pitching Change: Pedro Feliciano replaces Johan Santana, batting 8th, replacing Gary Sheffield.
Ryan Church remains in the game as the right fielder.
Jimmy Rollins grounds out softly, pitcher Pedro Feliciano to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Shane Victorino doubles (6) on a soft pop up to right fielder Ryan Church, deflected by second baseman Alex Cora.
Chase Utley grounds out, pitcher Pedro Feliciano to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
With Ryan Howard batting, wild pitch by Pedro Feliciano, Shane Victorino to 3rd.
Ryan Howard strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Francisco Rodriguez replaces Pedro Feliciano, batting 8th.
Jayson Werth grounds out, third baseman David Wright to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Raul Ibanez flies out to center fielder Carlos Beltran.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Matt Stairs replaces Pedro Feliz.
Matt Stairs flies out to center fielder Carlos Beltran.
Jose Reyes grounds out, first baseman Ryan Howard to pitcher Chan Ho Park.
Alex Cora pops out to shortstop Jimmy Rollins.
Carlos Beltran called out on strikes.
Carlos Delgado flies out to center fielder Shane Victorino.
David Wright walks.
With Daniel Murphy batting, David Wright caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Carlos Ruiz to shortstop Jimmy Rollins.
Daniel Murphy strikes out swinging.
Jeremy Reed strikes out swinging.
Omir Santos pops out to first baseman Ryan Howard.
Johan Santana strikes out swinging.
Jose Reyes flies out to right fielder Jayson Werth.
Alex Cora lines out to shortstop Jimmy Rollins.
Carlos Beltran grounds out to first baseman Ryan Howard.
Carlos Delgado hit by pitch.
David Wright grounds into a double play, third baseman Pedro Feliz to second baseman Chase Utley to first baseman Ryan Howard. Carlos Delgado out at 2nd.
Daniel Murphy doubles (3) on a fly ball to center fielder Shane Victorino.
Jeremy Reed grounds out, second baseman Chase Utley to first baseman Ryan Howard.
Omir Santos strikes out swinging.
Johan Santana flies out to right fielder Jayson Werth.
Jose Reyes reaches on a missed catch error by pitcher Chan Ho Park, assist to first baseman Ryan Howard to Unknown (0).
With Alex Cora batting, Jose Reyes steals (7) 2nd base, . Jose Reyes advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by catcher Carlos Ruiz.
Alex Cora walks.
Carlos Beltran flies out to left fielder Raul Ibanez.
Pitching Change: Scott Eyre replaces Chan Ho Park, batting 9th, replacing Eric Bruntlett.
Carlos Delgado walks.
David Wright flies out to right fielder Jayson Werth.
Daniel Murphy flies out to center fielder Shane Victorino.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Fernando Tatis replaces Jeremy Reed.
Pitching Change: Chad Durbin replaces Scott Eyre, batting 9th.
Fernando Tatis singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Pedro Feliz. Carlos Delgado scores. Fernando Tatis to 3rd. Throwing error by third baseman Pedro Feliz.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Gary Sheffield replaces Omir Santos.
Gary Sheffield walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ryan Church replaces Johan Santana.
Ryan Church strikes out swinging.
Jose Reyes lines out sharply to left fielder Raul Ibanez.
Alex Cora flies out to right fielder Jayson Werth.
Carlos Beltran strikes out swinging.
